author: mklement0
body:
The absence of such a switch currently makes it impossible to target hidden filesystem items via wildcard expressions, as discussed in #6473, [specifically here](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6473#issuecomment-375930843).
Related: #6502



Environment data
----------------

```powershell
PowerShell Core v6.0.2 on macOS 10.13.3
PowerShell Core v6.0.2 on Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
PowerShell Core v6.0.2 on Microsoft Windows 10 Pro (64-bit; v10.0.15063)
Windows PowerShell v5.1.15063.674 on Microsoft Windows 10 Pro (64-bit; v10.0.15063)
```
title: Add a -Force switch to Test-Path, Convert-Path, Resolve-Path, Split-Path -Resolve, Join-Path -Resolve, Invoke-Item for targeting hidden items
